articles.author: Press Trust of India | Posted by: Sanya Budhiraja
articles.title: Fossils’ study suggests horses, rhinos, tapirs may have originated in or near India - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The 15-year study, published in the Journal of Vertebrate Palaeontology, pieces together a nearly complete picture of the skeletal anatomy of hoofed mammals that lived on the Indian subcontinent almost 55 million years ago.
